Relive the most iconic moments from entertainment powerhouses like Indiana Jones, Star Wars, Universal Studios, and many more. Enjoy accurate re-creations of the most famous pinball machines of all time with Williams Pinball, or have fun with Zen’s original creations. New tables arrive frequently!

Build your dream game room
Build up your own customizable 3D playroom with collectible items unlocked by playing.

The ultimate simulation
Enjoy digital pinball at its finest as Pinball FX brings you the most advanced simulation in pinball with Pro Physics for every table in the library, 4K HDR visuals, and ray tracing.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Fae's Anatomy: A Melodramatic Medical Mystery RPG
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fae’s Anatomy is a comedic storytelling RPG wrapped around a challenging logic puzzle, recreating the high-stakes melodrama of medical procedurals like Grey’s Anatomy, House, and General Hospital.

NO PH.D REQUIRED
Anybody can be an expert in Fae’s Anatomy. The game is set in a world where all forms of magic, spirituality, and mysticism are science. Science? Just another form of wizardry. Quackary, superstition, and pseudo-science work, but so does chemotherapy, antibiotics, and sound medicine.

REPLAYABILITY AND CHALLENGE
Fae’s Anatomy can generate one of up to 10,000 supernatural diseases from a single dice roll. The book contains the same diagnostic manual characters would use to find a cure, and the contents are even app-assisted to help sort through the possibilities. Is the Patient’s fever the result of a viral infection, or pyrokinesis? Is that extra hair a sign of early-onset lycanthropy, or a glandular problem?

A CURE FOR CHRONIC GAMEMASTERING
The Patient is a player too! Certain rules variants obscure the answer to the diagnostic puzzle from everyone. Patients must act out an escalating list of mysterious symptoms for the doctors, despite having few clues as to which disease is causing the problems. Roleplay well...or die!

M.D. STANDS FOR MELODRAMA
The rest of the players are Providers, medical professionals dedicated to finding a cure. But being a doctor is stressful! Our medical heroes need to steal medications from the pharmacy, make out in broom closets, and misbehave until medicine becomes interesting enough to watch on television. In Fae’s Anatomy, behaving like a messy drama queen is an essential tool for saving lives!
boardgame.rpg: Fae's Anatomy: A Melodramatic Medical Mystery RPG

boardgame.name: Nine Muses
boardgame.description:
Call upon the power of the Nine Muses to exchange the three types of knowledge (defined by Aristotle) and ascend to your rightful place as a sage before your rival philosophers.

Players take turns taking, exchanging, or stealing the three types of knowledge (depicted by coins, cubes, and meeple), then turning that knowledge in for victory points. The first player to 25 victory points wins.

Players will have access to two the abilities of types of Muses: Knowledge Seekers and Poetesses. On their turn, they can take one action with one Muse.


Knowledge Seekers: These Muses allow you to gain and trade knowledge using one of three knowledge exchange options
Poetesses: These Muses allow you to turn your knowledge in for victory points, or use a special ability (steal knowledge, copy an opponent's trade as an extra action, or replace a current Muse with one of your choice)


—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Four Lost Battles (2nd Edition)
boardgame.description:
Covers the Autumn Campaign, August-September, 1813. Update of the 2005 edition, with new maps and Universal Card System.

Battles covered:
GROSSBEEREN: To the Gates of Berlin, 23 August
KATZBACH: A Perilous Passage, 26 August
KULM: Enfilade in the Mountains, 29-30 August
DENNEWITZ: Collapse in the North, 6 September

After the defeats of Grossgörschen (May 2nd, 1813) and Bautzen (May 20th, 21st) the Prussian King and the Crown Prince of Sweden met at Trachenberg on July 9th. At July 12th they agreed together with Russia and (later) Austria on a Allied strategy to overhelm Napoleon by avoiding him in person on the battlefield and fight his subordinates only.

After winning a great victory at Dresden early in the Autumn Campaign (August 26th/ 27th, 1813), Napoleon saw his chances for victory gradually slip away in four lost battles over a two-week period. All four battles had been fought by his subordinates, showing the effect of a "Fabian strategy". The whole campaign was over in two weeks. By Sept. 6th, a battle in or near Leipzig was certain, leading into the Battle of Nations (October 16th-19th, 1813) around Leipzig.

GAME SYSTEM:
Series: The Library of Napoleonic Battles (OSG) - formerly known as the "Napoleon's Last Battles (NLB-)Series"
- scale = 480m/hex,
- time = 1hour/GT,
- strength = 500-800 men/SP.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Series: The Library of Napoleonic Battles (OSG)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: New copy, not in shrink as publisher does not use shrink wrapping.

boardgame.name: Flu Season Card Game
boardgame.description: A card game about staying healthy while eliminating others by getting them sick. Play cards against other players to cause them to lose heart tokens, the life tracking method for this game. Classes include Official, Rude Stranger, Introvert, and Scientist.

boardgame.name: Tiny Epic Dungeons: Dice Tray
boardgame.description: Hexagonal dice tray in Tiny Epic Dungeons design
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Tiny Epic Dungeons: Potions & Perils Mini Expansion

boardgame.name: Tiny Epic Dungeons: Adventure Bag
boardgame.description: A colorful bag that holds the Tiny Epic Dungeons Game and all Add-ons, expansions and accessory.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Tiny Epic Dungeons: Potions & Perils Mini Expansion

boardgame.name: BoozeQuest
boardgame.description:
BoozeQuest is a fantasy drinking game like few others! At its core, it plays as a classic roll and move board game, but it combines elements of turn based combat, special events at the end of rounds, a bit of role-playing to describe the action as it unfolds, and oh, yes—beer! Copious amounts of beer. This game is not for the faint of heart—or liver! To win, reach the top of the castle, defeat the evil Booze Dragon, and be the first to claim the Everlasting Keg!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Touch It
boardgame.description:
Touch it is a competitive dexterity game that can be learned in 5 seconds. All you have to do is to touch the back of the card and guess the matching picture on it. It is an easy game that your friends also feel it too, so let the battles begin!

Everyone takes a card without checking and touching the back. Someone counts down 3 2 1 go. Everyone starts touching the back of the card, there will be an obvious curve for you to touch. Once someone figures out the shape, slap the card on the table and say "Ready". Do not reveal the answer and wait until everyone finishes. When there is only one player left still touching, he/she has to stop immediately and put down the card on the table.

Start guessing the answer from the first player who said "Ready":
The first one who guesses it right gets 2 points.
The rest of the players who guess correctly get 1 point.
Whoever guesses it wrong gets 0 points.

The game uses cards to score points, whoever gets 7 points or higher wins the game immediately!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Al Casino 6 Black Hearts
boardgame.description:
This game has 5 turns as 1 round and repeats the rounds. Each time you repeat a round, the points of the curse written on the curse card will be added.

At the time of point calculation for each round, the player whose total curse points are 13 points or more loses the game. The player with the fewest curse points at that time wins the game. In adition, the player who wins all the curse cards by himself in one round wins the game. In this case, everyone except the winning player will be defeated.

boardgame.name: Good Society: Expanded Acquaintance
boardgame.description:
This is the Expanded Acquaintance Expansion, which collects 4 expansions for Good Society, 2 mini-expansions, and guides to combining expansions and hacking the game.

This book includes:


Pride, Prejudice and Practical Magics Expansion
Sense, Sensibility and Swordsmanship Expansion
Downstairs at the Abbey Expansion
Emma, Forget Me Not Expansion
The Fae Courts Mini-Expansion
Lady Susan P.I. Mini-Expansion
Guide to Combining Expansions
Guide to Hacking Good Society


- User summary
boardgame.rpg: Good Society: A Jane Austen Role-Playing Game

boardgame.name: Masters of the Universe: Battleground
boardgame.description:
Will Skeletor and his Evil Warriors conquer Castle Grayskull? Will He-Man and his friends manage to stop them? Will Orko succeed in casting any spells? Answers to these and many other questions can be found by playing Masters of the Universe: Battleground!

Masters of the Universe: Battleground is a skirmish miniature game for two players, where forces of good and evil clash in epic combat. This glorious battle will shake the earth and change the fate of the entire Eternia!

Players equip their characters with the most excellent weapons, spells, and equipment; then, they create decks consisting of 20 amazing fate cards. Those cards will be used to activate characters on the battlefield during the game. It is entirely up to the players how many cards they will use on each of their characters. Do you want to use all your cards on the mighty He-Man? Go ahead! However, it may be challenging to win this battle alone.

Unlike many skirmish games, players don't have to accept the outcome of the cruel dice. Masters of the Universe: Battleground provides many ways to control luck. Characters can spend mana to reroll even the most stubborn dice, perform a focus action to increase their chances, and use the environment to their advantage.

Gain victory points by knocking out the opponent's characters, claiming objectives, and fulfilling secret side missions. Whoever gathers the most victory points at the end of round four is a winner!

-description from publisher

listing.notes:
Masters of the Universe: Battleground by Archon Studio
New in Shrink - Shipping worldwide
Payment
PayPal - if payment is made with option Sending to a friend or family no extra % is needed; if not 5% to be added as PayPal fees We prefer the no-cost option by bank transfer via SEPA, IBAN - no extra fee
Shipping costs will be communicated with buyer at time of purchase.
For any further questions, feel free to contact us!
Title: Masters of the Universe: Battleground Publisher: Archon Studio Language(s): English

boardgame.name: 12 Monks
boardgame.description:
This story takes place when Portugal was taking shape...

12th century. With his armies marching towards the south, Afonso Henriques, the King of Portugal, could not abandon the territory conquered from the moors and decided to donate a huge plot of land in the center of the country (44000 hectares) to a religious order of French origin called Cister. This community of monks, which had already settled in other regions, would have to manage the territory and resources of this place.

In order to do that, an enormous monastery was built in Alcobaça and that same monastery would go on to become one of the most important for the Order.

The Order of Cister’s motto was Ora et Labora (prayer and work), so their abbeys were usually in secluded locations. Silence for their prayers was Paramount, as was easy access to stone in order to build the monastery and several other goods, such as wood and iron (essential to build farming equipment and tools).
Fertile land and access to water (necessary for food, hygiene a agriculture) were also essential to achieve self-sufficiency.

Alcobaça filled all the requirements for the task, so the Order of Cister accepted the king’s challenge and this is the historical background from which the “12 Monks” boardgame is born.

12 Monks is a competitive game where players will emulate the mission given by the King to the Order of Cister to manage and run the resources from the grounds of Alcobaça.
Players will occupy this territory, produce and manufacture cultivated goods, extract the necessary resources to build the monastery of Alcobaça and build the levada that will give them access to the fundamental fresh water.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Patient 0
boardgame.description:
Patient Zero is a strategic and very challenging game with a lot of player interaction and few simple rules. It’s a visual puzzle game that works with layers and has a strong and unusual table presence with chromatic combinations with an isometric and amorphous look (each turn the board will be reshaped and the board will always have different shapes from game-to-game).

The game uses tile laying, pattern recognition/building and area control mechanics to promote interesting decisions and cognitive work. It has a fast setup and a short game length.

SAMPLE #28 // MEDICAL REPORT

The sample was taken 12 days after the first symptoms. At the time the patient showed several symptoms and the infection was spreading throughout the lungs, stomach, liver and kidneys.

This game takes place inside a laboratory where each player will be a scientist working to discover a vaccine against a fast spreading virus discovered on patient zero. Time is of the essence and each player has to work on the taken sample (tile-laying on a common board) in order to fulfil the immune system’s demands (therapeutic objectives) and getting antibodies (Y disc) which are necessary to neutralize the antigen agent in each of the four affected organs.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Ekphrastic Beasts
boardgame.description:
148 pages of entirely original monsters, complete with backstories and stats compatible with the 5th Edition of Dungeons & Dragons.
Full page, color illustrations on every spread.
Multiple beastly indexes in the back!
Printed on premium 80lb.
(Author Website)

boardgame.name: Trophy Gold
boardgame.description:
From the Kickstarter:

Trophy Gold is a game of desperation and risk. It’s about penniless treasure-hunters exploring the deep and forgotten places of the world, and the wonders and monstrosities they find there. The longer these adventurers stay on the hunt, the greater their chance of recovering treasures that will allow them to retire in comfort and security. But, should they delve too deep—should they linger in the wilds too long—their chances of survival vanish.

boardgame.name: Qube: utan tvekan
boardgame.description: You get 10 questions in quick succession. And you must not answer yes, no, repeat the question or hesitate. The questions try to get you astray so it's easier said than done. At the slightest hesitation, your opponents throw themselves over the stopwatch. Collect cards by keeping your tongue straight in your mouth. Are you in?

boardgame.name: Qvalitetstid: Parforhold
boardgame.description:
Do you want to have fun and cozyness?
Do you want to have great contact?
Do you want more intimacy in your relationship?


This quiz-game will strengthen you as a couple, and you certainly don't need to have problems to play the game. It's a tool to bring you closer together.

The 200 cards in 8 categories, will help you to get to know each other, and bring you closer, while you have fun, laugh, and develop your relations, and talk about subject that you might have forgotten in your day-to-day life.

Qvalitetstid - Parforhold is a quiz-game which is cozy and fun to play. You will closeness and more positive contact in your conversations, and your will have som real talks, which will give your a closer relationship, more intimacy and a greater understanding of each other.

The game is developed by couples-therpist Anna Østergaard and game-designer Jake Inlove.

boardgame.name: Wings of Glory: Pocket Travel Edition
boardgame.description:
Card-only version published on the issue #25 of the magazine IoGioco (April 2022). 3 maneuvre decks, 6 planes (to play in 6 with two copies), trenches and machine guns. Simplified combat rules and a range of scenarios. 100% compatible with all Wings of War and Wings of Glory sets.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Wings of Glory: WW1 Rules and Accessories Pack

boardgame.name: Yubitsume
boardgame.description:
Fingers off the dice!
You only keep your fingers if you move them at the right moment. If you are late or if your paws are grabbing the wrong place, you will soon nolonger be able to pickle.

Osaka‘s yakuza bosses have a problem. Their people are rotting away,
the lack of discipline is rampant. It cannot go on like this! After the latest
scandal, it is finally time to act and apply the best practices. From now
on the following applies: Yubitsume ... Every misconduct costs a finger.

Yubitsume means shortening of the fingers. Fortunately,m this game is
not like the original, in Japan. With Yubitsume, the yakuza have to snip
themselvers when they screw up. It follows a strict ritual: You cut off a
finger joint in the same presence of the lan chief. If the boss is in a nasty
mood, it can be a bit more. You repeat that until ... need we say more.

Even in the Heldbergs‘ game Yubitsume, mistakes and inaction do not go
unpunished. Whenever that happens normally with the yakuza, fingers
come off, if you still have some to remove! But rest assured, everything
runs more gently and - let‘s say more symbolically - in this game.

listing.notes: Title: Yubitsume Publisher: Heldbergs Language(s): German

boardgame.name: The Printer's Devils
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
A promotional adventure for LotFP in the Weird Crusher series.

An alchemist experiment goes heavily wrong and as a result the alchemist turns into a sentient fungus colony, which infects a drunk printing press operator. The spores transform the operator and absorb him into the colony. The new entity becomes obsessed with printing flawless books...

boardgame.name: Audacious Adversaries
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Audacious Adversaries is a supplement for Four Against Darkness for parties of level 5-9. It features new monsters, new retainers, special features and unique treasures. Featuring: Zombie and Silver Sigbins, Creeping Kapres, Green Genies, Sentient Floating Fireballs, Maggot Warriors, Scarred Scarecrows, Corpse Golems, Cavalier Ghouls, Werehippos, Taunting Tiyanaks, Viridian Spiders, Polychromatic Dragons, plus 6 New Trap Rooms, 6 New Special Features, 12 New Magic and Unique Items, 6 Useless Items, 10 new retainers (Veteran Bodyguard, Eye Surgeon, Treasure Expert, Decoy, Fungi Fighter, Orc Negotiator, Wizard’s Assistant, Chronicler, Curse Neutralizer and Dungeon Runner) and 8 Quick Encounters for short sessions.

boardgame.name: Héroes y Mitos
boardgame.description: Thematic board game with mythological content.

boardgame.name: Caldera Power Station
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Built into the wall of a volcanic caldera, this power station draws energy from the center of the planet.

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Wargame game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A pair of 30 x 30 maps depicting the interior and exterior of futuristic power station built into a volcanic crater. Includes roof overlay png

boardgame.name: Ases del Estadio
boardgame.description:
Thematic game of Olympic Athletics.

Compete in 13 different disciplines of Olympic Athletics.

boardgame.name: Harfnaross Docks
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Guarded by strong walls and towers by the dock gate, the harbour of Harfnaross is a busy and bustling place.

A printable rpg battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl or skirmish game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset. The map is 50x50, equivalent to 25 of our standard 10x10 tiles.

boardgame.name: The Lich's Phylactery
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Guarded by the dead, do you dare venture here?

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30x60 battlemap depicting the dungeon chamber containing a lich's phylactery. Includes interior and exterior, plus roof overlay.

boardgame.name: Remarkable Cults & Their Followers
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Remarkable Cults & Their Followers is the ultimate GM guide on roleplaying evil fantasy factions. This system-neutral sourcebook is compatible with any fantasy roleplaying game ruleset and contains everything you need to create and roleplay your own unique villainous guilds.

This brand-new book brings you exciting, intriguing, and complex evil factions, as well the tools to create your own. This includes villainous leaders and their cronies, rumors, new gameplay ideas, services, information on working for and against cults, gaining ranks and followers, and much, much more. This system-neutral book is not just about religious cults, but instead delights the imagination with a wide range of sinister organizations and factions to add to your game.

boardgame.name: Wondrous Expeditions: Forests
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Roleplaying wilderness travels can be challenging for us GMs. The Wondrous Expeditions Forest book makes roleplaying wilderness travel exciting, engaging, and challenging. Descriptive, system-neutral content helps bring the environment to life in great detail and atmosphere. Tap into a wealth of world-building tools, new forest types, travel and survival gameplay, unique flora, fauna, new monsters, and more to launch your players on their next wondrous expedition.

The contents of this book will make the journey be an adventure itself.

Ready-made content to help describe scenes in great detail, such as sights, sounds, smells, landmarks, flora & fauna, and terrain features.
Roleplaying concepts to help make the wilderness expedition a meaningful adventure, from preparation, outset, travel to arrival.
Challenge your players using the environment, such as forest terrain hazards, boons, weather conditions, and landmarks.
Make the journey matter with refreshing encounter ideas, twists, and hooks that make time, navigation rules, foraging, and survival.
4 richly-detailed new forests biomes, complete with flora, fauna, new monsters, and quest hooks.
2 exciting scalable adventures that use forest locations and monsters from this book
Expedition System Appendix (optional travel rules)
5e monster stat block Appendix
system neutral. for any fantasy roleplaying game

boardgame.name: Key Pai Sho
boardgame.description:
The first fan-made version of Pai Sho to accurately imitate the mysterious board game as it was portrayed in 'Avatar: The Last Airbender'. Key Pai Sho was created with the intention of simplifying and condensing the core elements of existing versions of the game, while simultaneously being able to accurately imitate every move played in the show.

In a battle of wits, two players compete to arrange flower tiles and create a ring of harmony around the centre of the board, all while disrupting their opponent's attempts through a variety of creative means. Using strategic thinking and a heavy dose of creativity, out-position your opponent and claim victory.

Harmonies form between Key Flower tiles, while Special Effect tiles are used to influence the board in varied and original ways. Select the effect tiles that best support your playstyle and invent unique and powerful combinations to surprise your opponent. The first player to create an uninterrupted chain of harmonies around the centre of the board wins.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: TV Shows: Avatar The Last Airbender/Legend of Korra

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Dragon Teeth of Kataphrasis
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the ruins left by the wizard Kataphrasis are left strange artifacts from the age when the stars fell from the sky. In the dim corridors inhabited by foul goblin raiders and their gnoll allies are left strange magics and few explorers are left umtouched after exploring the depths.

It all begins with a caravan plundered by goblins and a rescue mission to free the prisoners of the goblins but from the within the dark, deeper than the goblins care to go something calls to the curious - and this may be the undoing of the adventurers for magics of ancient wizards are better left alone.

Dragon Teeth of Kataphrasis takes the adventurers to a dungeon containing the remnants of old magics and it tempts them with powerful magical items that may release powerful the powers of a dragon. It as an adventure suitable for B/X games and retro-clones such as Labyrinth Lords and Old-School Essentials.

The adventure was originally written for the Danish Living Campaign The Hinterlands, and it is for the first time presented in English. The adventure introduces the players to a different tradition of adventures, and it one with a focus on exploration and encountering the unknown.

This adventure contains new monsters, new magical items and a new spell.

The adventure is for a level 3-5 party.

boardgame.name: Spitfire: The Fight for Air Supremacy
boardgame.description: Spitfire the fight for air supremacy, is a solitaire roll and write wargame. Putting the player in the cockpit of a Spitfire, belonging to 11 group during the Battle of Britain. The player will have to engage and destroy German fighters and try to reach German bombers before they drop their bombs on British airfields. The aim of the game is to protect British airfields and reduce German bomber production. The RAF are counting on you to take the fight to the skies beware the Hun in the sun. TALLY HO CHAPS

boardgame.name: Arena: The Contest – Tanares Classes Pack
boardgame.description: Tanares introduces four new classes to the world. Get miniatures that represent each of them (including alternate genders and subclasses!). The box also comes with 8x Heropads and 32x Attack Cards that you can use to play the boardgames Arena: the Contest and Tanares Adventures.

boardgame.name: Casino Night Game
boardgame.description:
POG Casino night let’s you play all your favorite casino games POG style!
Casino War,Blackjack Attack, Texas Hold’em Poker and more.
You can even invent your own games with the 52 POG’s and 2 Jokers.

boardgame.name: Babel Bricks
boardgame.description:
A set of wooden blocks with engraved letters that can be played in a multitude of ways.

There are 100 wooden blocks with a letter engraved on each side. The letters are distributed throughout the game in line with common usage of the English language, plus two blank blocks.

A standard set of rules have been printed on the box to serve as a suggestion, but the game lends itself to players originating and adapting the rules as they wish to determine.

The standard rules suggest building the tower 5 blocks to a level, with 20 levels and players using dexterity, strategy and spelling skills to slide out blocks to find words to collect points to win.

boardgame.name: Last Tea Shop
boardgame.description:
Description from https://springvillager.itch.io/last-tea-shop

Last Tea Shop is a one-page solo game about tea and conversation. Set up your stall and wait for visitors to emerge out of the mist. Over a cup of tea, chat to the visitor about their life and help prepare them for their trip into the Lands of the Dead. Record their thoughts, fears, dreams and hopes in your journal for posterity.

Play finishes when the mysterious Veiled One comes to visit.

boardgame.name: Neotopia
boardgame.description:
In Neotopia, a competitive fast paced tile placement pattern building game, you are part of a team of Visionaries who are building a futuristic pilot city focused on the fields of Energy, Technology, Community and Sustainable food.

You will be building elements on the three regions of the city in order to complete feature cards that you have in hand. A good combination of tile placement and card management can result in very impactful turns, where several cards are completed and the city expands. Interaction between players is important, because all players are building on the same board and can take advantage of what other players have built on their previous turns.

You will try to build the most harmonious city possible, because that will be vital for your score: in the end of the game you will triple your score on the region where you have less points, you will double your score on the region where you have your second biggest score and you will score normally the region where you have your highest score. So be aware! Even if it’s tempting to build on regions that are more developed and where you have already scored a lot points, if you don’t start working on the development of the other regions you will not be able to win the game. Balance is the key point on Neotopia, just like the type of future that the players are trying to build.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: In The Shadow Of Jupiter
boardgame.description:
In The Shadow Of Jupiter is a 1-4 player cooperative resource management game set on four moons of Jupiter.
The year is 2075. Earth is running out of resources. Countries and global corporations are growing desperate and have taken to the outer planets for a new source of energy to replace our dwindling reserves. A deep space probe discovers a new rare element in the lower troposphere of Jupiter which scientists name Exonium. This element will provide significant relief to the energy crisis on Earth.
In a move to beat its competitors, the Power Dynamics Corporation (PDC) has decided to take matters into its own hands. PDC has built a large carrier spacecraft containing four drop ships and sufficient resources to initiate development of stations on four of the moons of Jupiter, Io, Europa, Ganymede, and Callisto.

You and your fellow PDC teammates will serve as the Commanders of these moon stations. You will each strive to establish a base camp, build the necessary production facilities, and become self-sufficient all the while working with your fellow commanders to get the Orbital Platform running at full strength. The environment around Jupiter is an extremely hostile one. Radiation, magnetic storms, moon quakes, and uncounted quantities of small debris rain down on every moon within the Jovian system. Life on an inhospitable foreign moon can be dangerous, but if the human race is to survive, failure is not an option…….

Welcome to In the Shadow of Jupiter, a strategic co-op game where you and your fellow PDC colleagues will strive to build stations on the different moons of Jupiter and survive against the dangers of space long enough to complete construction on the orbital mining platform. You are up against the clock, you can only last for so long before running out of supplies!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Aeon Trespass: Odyssey – Onwards Odyssey
boardgame.description:
Onwards Odyssey is a new Storybook consisting of two mini-Cycles, one that takes place after Cycle I and another after Cycle II. These are not campaign extensions! They’re new, separate stories with a more relaxed feel – you’ve won the respective Cycle after all – now you can take a more leisurely approach to travel around the Map.

New special adventure hubs tell new, uplifting stories of people coming to grips with the ending of each of these Cycles. Mind you, there is still danger in the world, some brand new, but the way you approach it is different.

Along with the new stories come new rules. The aforementioned new Voyage rules that allow for a more relaxed pace, completely new rewards and penalties for adventures, and new thematic Battles.

As the Onwards Odyssey stories take place after the corresponding Cycle, you won’t be able to access normal Cycle hubs… but you will be able to experience some of the R&R, Dreams of Pharos and Inward Odyssey adventures you’ve missed.

To keep it interesting, there is a caveat to going on an Onwards Odyssey though! During normal play, once you cross from Cycle to Cycle, you base Argo stats replenish. No such luck with Onwards Odyssey! So, if you were running on empty and snatched victory out of the jaws of defeat at the last moment, you’ll be hard-pressed to rebuild your ship and crew before you move to Lakonia or Delphi.
Onwards Odyssey is more than 50k words of stories, rules, battles and secrets!

-description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Good Society: Service & Ambition Deck
boardgame.description:
Good Society: Service & Ambition Deck contains all the cards you need to play Downstairs at the Abbey, Emma, Forget Me Not, The Fae Courts and Lady Susan P.I. expansions for Good Society.

This deck contains downstairs cards #127-151, fae court cards #152-161, emma cards #162-169 and lady susan cards #170-175 and additional connection cards #176-200.

- from the back cover
boardgame.rpg: Good Society: A Jane Austen Role-Playing Game

boardgame.name: Good Society: Love & Longing Deck
boardgame.description:
Fan the flames of love & longing with 25 new desires for the base game, as well as 5 new desires for Emma, Forget Me Not. Explore all new stories with nine original playsets bursting with drama.

- from publisher's blurb
boardgame.rpg: Good Society: A Jane Austen Role-Playing Game

boardgame.name: Tainted Grail: Kings of Ruin
boardgame.description:
Kings of Ruin is a new stand-alone story campaign from the team behind the acclaimed Tainted Grail board game, set in the same universe. Playable with a brand new set of exciting characters, it continues the stories of Fall of Avalon, Last Knight, and Age of Legends while also providing a perfect self-contained entry into the saga for new players.

During your experience with the game you will explore new land (with a totally changed system of traveling through Wyrdness), solve encounters with force or diplomacy with unique puzzle card system, and develop your heroes with new passive skills, cards and powerful items.

Most importantly, you will discover a dark immersive story of abandoned land at the wrong side of Avalon and Kings of Ruin ruling there:
Claudyne, the Unknighted.
Amberqueen Veneda.
Nonus, Bishop of the Deep.
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon

boardgame.name: Second Succession War
boardgame.description:
War To End All Wars

By 2821, the “Great Succession War” has ground to a halt, the participants seeking desperate respite and to forge a new peace and hope for mankind. Yet not everyone shares this ideal and soon secret machinations undermine the peace efforts and propel the Inner Sphere into a new round of violence. Soon brother will be set against brother and madness will reign once more: The Second Succession War.
The Second Succession War covers the aftermath of the titanic First Succession War and the Great Houses efforts to survive before the machinations of Conrad Toyama propel them into a new round of blood-letting. Detailing the efforts to build a peace while preparing for a new war, this volume showcases the causes and consequences of the Second Succession War, as well as the politics and stresses between and within the Great Houses.

- from the back cover

boardgame.name: Plant Harvesting Guide
boardgame.description:
A guide for the modern herbalist.

From the introduction:

This guide provides a list of herbs, weeds, leaves and other tree parts, including aquatic plant life that can be harvested and used. The guide includes a remake of the herbalist tool kit and skill, and many item cards and imagery.

boardgame.name: A DM's Guide to Running Dragon of Icespire Peak
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

A guide to make the adventure easy to run plus 18 new random encounters.

User summary:

Requires the use of D&D Essentials Kit.

boardgame.name: Fearful Flora & Fungi
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Within the pages of this field guide are a smattering of the terrifying carnivorous plant life inspired by the strange adaptations of plants from our own realm... Experience the psychedelic mind-melting of the myconid amanita; be lured towards the humanoid illusions of the violet orchid; despair as the nauseating stench of the viper tree fills the air; and much more!

boardgame.name: Aquatic Terrors
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Within the pages of this field guide are a handful of eerie and unusual water-dwelling or water-adjacent creatures inspired by weird animals from our own plane that are perfect for inclusion in your Ghosts of Saltmarsh adventures! See through the illusions of the arcanelure anglerfish; recoil from the acidic backsplash of the giant nudibranch; flee before the pharyngeal jaws of the moray dragon drag you down its gullet; and much more!

boardgame.name: Cosmic Encounter: Cosmic Odyssey
boardgame.description: This seventh expansion is the biggest expansion yet for cosmic encounter. introduces a campaign mode, 30 new aliens, 12 "alternate timeline" aliens revising previous aliens, and adds new space stations, technology, and hazards. It also adds new features, such as lux and moons.

boardgame.name: The Infernal Prison - Dark Lake
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

What deity is kept prisoner in such a place?
A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30x60 battlemap depicting an underground cavern lake with a prison for a deity or powerful demon. Ideal for planar adventures. Includes interior and exterior, plus roof overlay.

boardgame.name: The Infernal Prison - Mist
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

What deity is kept prisoner in such a place?

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30x60 battlemap depicting a mist-filled landscape with a prison for a deity or powerful demon. Ideal for planar adventures, such as the shadowfell Includes interior and exterior, plus roof overlay.

boardgame.name: The Infernal Prison - Astral
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

What deity is kept prisoner in such a place?

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30x60 battlemap depicting an astral planar landscape with a prison for a deity or powerful demon. Ideal for planar adventures. Includes interior and exterior, plus roof overlay.

boardgame.name: The Infernal Prison - Lava
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

What deity is kept prisoner in such a place?

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30x60 battlemap depicting a lava-filled landscape with a prison for a deity or powerful demon. Ideal for planar adventures. Includes interior and exterior, plus roof overlay.

boardgame.name: Master Dater
boardgame.description:
Cyanide and Happiness present their third game.

In Master Dater, the messed-up dating game, players take turns being the sexy single. Other players then combine heads and bodies to make messed-up dates to pander to three unusual interests of the single. The single then awards the player or players who best argued their case with heart, love, and flame cards.

When a player has one of each and five total, that player becomes the Master Dater and wins the game.

boardgame.name: Artificer Specialization: The Toymaster
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

"Come one and all and watch my amazing toy constructs perform!"

- Izzy Coppercoil, Gnome Toymaster


The Toymaster is an artificer that creates clockwork toy constructs for entertainment & espionage.

boardgame.name: Artificer Specialization: The Aeronaut
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The Aeronaut is a subclass for the Artificer that is all about magical flight. With magic and artifice, these aviators craft a unique flying apparatus that allows them to soar through the skies! They also specialize their magic around weather effects that allow them to gain an advantage in combat.

This subclass also includes two new Artificer infusions that will benefit the aeronaut while in flight.

boardgame.name: Arcane Tradition: The Storyweaver
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

There are few wizards whose ability to spin tales out of imagination brings them to life. A Storyweaver is one who weaves spells into fairy tales, myths, and legends.

This rare arcane tradition encrypts spells betwixt the words of fantastical tales. These wizards collect fables, folklore and fairytales into Storybooks that act as their Spellbooks. These spellbooks appear to be a collection of stories to anyone but the storyweaver.

Storyweaver wizards are similar to Bards in that they can regale crowds with amazing tales of adventures and cast spells, however, a Storyweaver Wizard specializes in the blend of evocation and illusion. A magical tradition that empowers narrative storytelling with arcane energy.

boardgame.name: Bard: College of the Scatman
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

This subclass is for bards who mastered the art of scat singing. The typical College of the Scatman Bard has a great, albeit off color, sense of humor, and just in general loves all the things life has to offer.

boardgame.name: Blessed of the Broken God: Saints of Damara and Impiltur
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Presented here is extensive lore on the saints of the deity Ilmater located in the kingdoms of Damara and Impiltur in the Forgotten Realms. Showcased are:


a new feat - Patron Saint;
five new clerical domains - Discipline, Dragon, Earth, Suffering and Vengeance;
new cleric spells unique to the priesthood of the Crying God - Draconic Ward and Embattlement; and
new magic items - the legendary sword Crusader and the artifact known as the Bloody Shackle of Irimae.

boardgame.name: Bloodied & Bruised Vol. 1: Monster Manual
Bloodied & Bruised: Monster Manual
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The bugbear chief nurses a gushing wound in her side before issuing an order of retreat to her allies. A bright light forms around the angel’s dying body, blinding everyone near it as it passes on from the world of the living. With blood streaming down its torso, an enraged hill giant slams its fists into the ground and causes the earth around it to quake.

Bloodied & Bruised is a series providing new combat actions for the creatures in the 5e roster. When pushed to their limits in combat, these monsters, critters, fiends, and foes gain new abilities that aid them in battle, or perhaps spell their doom depending on the circumstances. Bloodied & Bruised takes inspiration from the "bloodied" condition from 4e, making entirely new combat actions that can completely change the nature of a fight.

In addition, Bloodied & Bruised also introduces several "death throes" to the game, marking the demise of certain creatures with a grand explosion, heavy fall, or other unique effect to make the slaying of a great monster a truly unique experience.

boardgame.name: Bloodied & Bruised Vol. 2: Volo's Guide to Monsters
Bloodied & Bruised: Volo's Guide to Monsters
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

New Combat Actions for the Creatures in Volo's Guide to Monsters

The bugbear chief nurses a gushing wound in her side before issuing an order of retreat to her allies. A bright light forms around the angel’s dying body, blinding everyone near it as it passes on from the world of the living. With blood streaming down its torso, an enraged hill giant slams its fists into the ground and causes the earth around it to quake.

Bloodied & Bruised is a series providing new combat actions for the creatures in the 5e roster. When pushed to their limits in combat, these monsters, critters, fiends, and foes gain new abilities that aid them in battle, or perhaps spell their doom depending on the circumstances. Bloodied & Bruised takes inspiration from the "bloodied" condition from 4e, making entirely new combat actions that can completely change the nature of a fight.

In addition, Bloodied & Bruised also introduces several "death throes" to the game, marking the demise of certain creatures with a grand explosion, heavy fall, or other unique effect to make the slaying of a great monster a truly unique experience.

boardgame.name: Battletech: Record Sheets – 3050 Upgrades Unabridged – Inner Sphere
boardgame.description: BattleTech Record Sheets: 3050 Upgrades Unabridged, Inner Sphere offers players the record sheets for all the Inner Sphere BattleMechs detailed in BattleTech Technical Readout: 3050 Upgrade, over 250 in total, many variants making their debut here. The Clan and Star League designs can be found in BattleTech Record Sheets: 3050 Upgrades Unabridged, Clan and Star League.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Codex of Herbal Medicine
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Codex of Herbal Medicine contains the formulae for several herbal adventuring gear that can be created using an herbalism kit. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features rules for gathering herbs while traveling, a new magic item, a new feat, and 34 herbal items.

boardgame.name: Codex of Herbal Toxins
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Codex of Herbal Toxins contains the formulae for several poisons that can be created using a poisoner’s kit. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, 20 new poisons, and rules for harvesting poisonous plants.

boardgame.name: Codex of Practical Alchemy
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Codex of Practical Alchemy contains the formulae for several alchemical adventuring gear that can be created using alchemist’s supplies. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, and 46 alchemical items.

boardgame.name: Battletech: Record Sheets – 3050 Upgrades Unabridged – Clan & Star League
boardgame.description: BattleTech Record Sheets: 3050 Upgrades Unabridged, Clan & Star League offers players the record sheets for all the Clan OmniMechs and Star League Vehicles, BattleMechs and Aerospace Fighters detailed in BattleTech Technical Readout: 3050 Upgrade, over 350 in total, many variants making their debut here. The Inner Sphere designs can be found in BattleTech Record Sheets: 3050 Upgrades Unabridged, Inner Sphere.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Codex of Volatile Alchemy
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Codex of Volatile Alchemy contains the formulae for several alchemical weapons that can be created using alchemist’s supplies. These include biological, chemical, and pyrotechnic weapons. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, and 40 alchemical items.

boardgame.name: Gourmand's Cookbook
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Gourmand’s Cookbook contains instructions on culinary techniques and recipes for a variety of food and drink. Included are the formulae for several culinary magic items. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features 17 new magic items (the book itself and 16 culinary masterpieces), a new feat, 14 adventuring gear, rules for overeating, and rules for alcohol poisoning.

boardgame.name: Enchiridion of the Forge
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Enchiridion of the Forge contains instructions and diagrams detailing the fabrication of various arms and armors. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, a new armor, a new shield, 32 new weapons, and rules for advanced weapon training for the weapons included in this book.

boardgame.name: Miscellanea of Fantastic Gizmos
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Miscellanea of Fantastic Gizmos contains instructions and diagrams detailing the fabrication of various items of elaborate design. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, 24 new adventuring gear, 6 new armors, 14 new weapons, and rules for advanced weapon training for the weapons included in this book.

boardgame.name: Book of Sacred Truth
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This book explores the elven teachings of truth and morality. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item and 11 new feats.

boardgame.name: Disquisition of the Old Faith
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Disquisition of the Old Faith contains archaic druidic customs and practices. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, 6 new feats, and 26 new spells.

boardgame.name: Enchiridion of Soranath Artifice
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Enchiridion of Soranath Artifice contains instructions and diagrams detailing the fabrication of various items of dwarven design. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, 4 new feats, 22 new adventuring gear, a new armor, 5 new weapons, rules for advanced weapon training for the weapons included in this book, and rules for alcohol poisoning.

boardgame.name: Compendium of Martial Treatises
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Compendium of Martial Treatises contains the treatises for various fighting styles and weapon techniques. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, 28 new fighting styles for the fighter class, and rules for advanced weapon training for the weapons in the Player's Handbook.

boardgame.name: Grimoire of Forgotten Arcana
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Grimoire of Forgotten Arcana contains a collection of spells cataloged by the acclaimed wizardly researcher and scholar Magus Atticus Maeral Sarwenys Groumbro Rubani. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, 8 new feats, and 21 new spells.

boardgame.name: Tome of Nature's Wardens
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Tome of Nature’s Wardens contains the sacred rites and teachings of the druid Circle of Nature’s Wardens. The book itself serves as a player aid, and features a new magic item, a new feat, a new druid circle, and rules for an alternate use of the Wild Shape druid feature.
